changeSet.author: jjt
changeSet.sql: UPDATE aea_item_basic SET ITEM_NATURE = ( CASE ITEM_NATURE WHEN '1' THEN '0' WHEN '2' THEN '8' ELSE ITEM_NATURE END );

changeSet.author: jjt
changeSet.sql: update act_sto_view set sql_text="SELECT aiv_123.ITEM_VER_ID, aiv_123.ITEM_ID, aiv_123.VER_NUM, aib_123.ITEM_CODE, aib_123.ITEM_NAME, aib_123.ORG_ID, aib_123.XKDX, aib_123.ITEM_PROPERTY, aib_123.DUE_NUM AS DUE_NUM, aib_123.BJ_TYPE, ooo_123.ORG_NAME FROM AEA_ITEM_VER aiv_123 LEFT JOIN AEA_ITEM_BASIC aib_123 ON aiv_123.ITEM_VER_ID = aib_123.ITEM_VER_ID LEFT JOIN OPU_OM_ORG ooo_123 ON aib_123.org_id = ooo_123.org_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND aiv_123.IS_DELETED = 0 AND aiv_123.ITEM_VER_STATUS IN ('1', '2') AND aib_123.item_nature = '0' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM aea_item item WHERE item.parent_item_id = aib_123.item_id )" where view_comment = '现场登记'

changeSet.author: jjt
jjt
changeSet.sql: update aea_item_basic set SFSXGZCNZ = CASE SFSXGZCNZ WHEN '0' THEN '0' WHEN '1' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END;

changeSet.author: jjt
changeSet.sql: UPDATE aea_item_basic SET ITEM_PROPERTY = CASE ITEM_PROPERTY WHEN '1' THEN '1' WHEN '2' THEN '2' WHEN '3' THEN '4' WHEN 'LBJ' THEN '3' WHEN 'DFJ' THEN '5' WHEN 'DBJ' THEN '6' END;

changeSet.author: sam
sam
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE `act_sto_proc_susp_act` MODIFY COLUMN `SUSPEND_TIME` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '挂起时间' AFTER `PROCINST_ID`, MODIFY COLUMN `ACTIVATE_TIME` datetime NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '激活时间' AFTER `SUSPEND_TIME`, MODIFY COLUMN `CREATE_TIME` datetime NOT NULL AFTER `CREATER`, MODIFY COLUMN `MODIFY_TIME` datetime NOT NULL AFTER `MODIFIER`;
ALTER TABLE `act_de_model` MODIFY COLUMN `LAST_UPDATED` datetime(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `CREATED_BY`;
